item.title: [DELTA]::ontrading/offtrading[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

open client.java and press ctrl+f then serach for customcommand and add this 2 commands into it =)

::ontrading

if(command.startsWith("ontrading") && playerRights > 1 || command.startsWith("tradingon") && playerRights > 1){//means the command u have to use is ::ontrading or ::tradingon yell("["+playerName+"] - Turned on trading");//this line is telling every player that the person who used the command turned trading on server.trading = true;//sets trading online }
::offtrading

if(command.startsWith("offtrading") && playerRights > 1 || command.startsWith("tradingoff") && playerRights > 1){//means the command u have to use is ::offtrading or ::tradingoff yell("["+playerName+"] - Turned off trading");//this line is telling every player that the person who used the command turned trading off server.trading = false;//this sets trading into offline }

search public void tradeReq(int id) {
and add this
if (!server.trading) { sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled");//if trading is offline and someone wants to trade someone he is getting this message return; }

UPDATES DONE hope this isnt a snippet anymore

Read full topic
